body_html: I don't know of anyone explicitly working on the C++ API at this time, so I'm going to mark this as "contributions welcome". I believe there are some issues with providing C++ libraries as binaries, though, because in general it is hard to make stable C++ ABI.
body_text: I don't know of anyone explicitly working on the C++ API at this time, so I'm going to mark this as "contributions welcome". I believe there are some issues with providing C++ libraries as binaries, though, because in general it is hard to make stable C++ ABI.
body: I don't know of anyone explicitly working on the C++ API at this time, so I'm going to mark this as "contributions welcome". I believe there are some issues with providing C++ libraries as binaries, though, because in general it is hard to make stable C++ ABI.
